title: Need A Team To Play With Tonight No Nooobs
body: I want to reach LvL 30 tonight im 200exp off lvl 29 so add me in game if you want to party together, I'm sick of playing with randoms who start fighting all the time. So lets work together add JY3 IN GAME. My brother is also playing so we need 3 more people to start smashin it out !!!!
